recommendations: For practicing Hitch Kick as a intermediate performer, the recommended warm-up exercises are Leg swings with pointed toes, High knees with jump, Broad jumps for 3 repetitions for 5 minutes. After warming up, you should practice the following instructions: Stand with feet hip-width apart., Kick leading leg forward, knee straight., Hop on supporting leg, bending knee., Kick trailing leg forward, knee straight., Land on trailing leg, leading leg in front. for 3 repetitions for 5 minutes. Since you want to particularly focus on stability, additional exercises could include Plank holds, Single-leg balance, Bosu ball balance.

For practicing Chaine Leaps as a intermediate performer, the recommended warm-up exercises are Chaine turn combinations, Saute arabesque, Saute attitude for 3 repetitions for 5 minutes. After warming up, you should practice the following instructions: Begin in B-plus position., Perform a chaine turn, swinging arms., Push off the back leg, leaping with straight legs., Land on the front leg, bending knees., Continue leaping with alternating legs. for 3 repetitions for 5 minutes. Since you want to particularly focus on stability, additional exercises could include Plank holds, Single-leg balance, Bosu ball balance.

For practicing Pique Turn as a intermediate performer, the recommended warm-up exercises are Pique enchaînement sequence, Pique arabesque turns, Pique attitude turns for 3 repetitions for 5 minutes. After warming up, you should practice the following instructions: Begin in B-plus position., Step onto demi-pointe of supporting leg., Rotate, extending working leg to passe., Transition to next pique turn or finish., Repeat steps 2-4, increasing speed. for 3 repetitions for 5 minutes. Since you want to particularly focus on stability, additional exercises could include Plank holds, Single-leg balance, Bosu ball balance.
